content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a Mexico-based supervisor and/or leader, you are required to participate in a training related to understanding requirements under EPAM's Policy, and the law,Â related to Harassment, Discrimination, and Retaliation:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://qa.adaptation.epam.com/assignments/mexico-eeo-discrimination-harassment-training-for-supervisors-leaders\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://qa.adaptation.epam.com/assignments/mexico-eeo-discrimination-harassment-training-for-supervisors-leaders\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
